chart.title: Greenhouse gas emissions
chart.subtitle: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) include carbon dioxide, methane and nitrous oxide from all sources, including land-use change. They are measured in tonnes of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) over a 100-year timescale.
chart.note: Land-use change emissions can be negative.

Annual greenhouse gas emissions in CO₂ e.titleShort: Annual greenhouse gas emissions including land use
Annual greenhouse gas emissions in CO₂ e.titleLong: Annual greenhouse gas emissions including land use
Annual greenhouse gas emissions in CO₂ e.descriptionShort: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) are measured in tonnes of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) over a 100-year timescale.
Annual greenhouse gas emissions in CO₂ e.descriptionProcessing: Emissions given in tonnes have been converted to carbon-dioxide equivalents over a 100-year timescale using a conversion factor of 273 for nitrous oxide, 29.8 for methane from fossil sources, and 27.2 for methane from agricultural and land use sources. These factors are taken from the 6th Assessment Report (AR6) of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
